docs.text: API Overview Welcome to the API documentation. This API provides user management and game features. Base URL https://api.example.com/v1 Common Headers { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Bearer <token>" } Error Responses { "error": { "code": "STATUS_CODE", "message": "Human-readable description" } } Status Code Description 400 Bad Request 401 Unauthorized 404 Not Found 500 Internal Server Error
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Welcome to the API documentation. This API provides user management and game features.
docs.title: API Overview

docs.text: { "error": { "code": "STATUS_CODE", "message": "Human-readable description" } } Status Code Description 400 Bad Request 401 Unauthorized 404 Not Found 500 Internal Server Error
docs.title: Error Responses

docs.text: Authentication Login POST /auth/login Authenticate user with credentials Request Body { "email_or_username": "user@example.com", "password": "securepassword123" } Success Response { "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...", "expires_in": 3600 } Sign-Up POST /auth/signup Create new user account Request Body (Email/Password) { "username": "new_user", "email": "new@example.com", "password": "SecurePassword123!" } Request Body (OAuth) { "provider": "google", "access_token": "ya29.a0AfH6SMB..." } Success Response { "id": "USER_ID", "username": "new_user", "email": "new@example.com", "created_at": "2023-07-15T12:34:56Z" } Error Code Description 400 Invalid credentials format 409 Email/username already exists
docs.title: Authentication

docs.text: Authenticate user with credentials Request Body { "email_or_username": "user@example.com", "password": "securepassword123" } Success Response { "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...", "expires_in": 3600 }
docs.title: POST /auth/login

docs.text: Create new user account Request Body (Email/Password) { "username": "new_user", "email": "new@example.com", "password": "SecurePassword123!" } Request Body (OAuth) { "provider": "google", "access_token": "ya29.a0AfH6SMB..." } Success Response { "id": "USER_ID", "username": "new_user", "email": "new@example.com", "created_at": "2023-07-15T12:34:56Z" } Error Code Description 400 Invalid credentials format 409 Email/username already exists
docs.title: POST /auth/signup

docs.text: Leaderboard Get Leaderboard GET /leaderboard Retrieve current game rankings Query Parameters | Name | Default | Description | |--------|---------|----------------------| | limit | 50 | Number of results | | offset | 0 | Pagination offset | Success Response { "total": 1000, "results": [ { "rank": 1, "username": "top_player", "score": 9850, "avatar": "https://..." }, { "rank": 2, "username": "second_best", "score": 9800, "avatar": "https://..." } ] } Error Code Description 400 Invalid parameters
docs.title: Leaderboard

docs.text: Retrieve current game rankings Query Parameters | Name | Default | Description | |--------|---------|----------------------| | limit | 50 | Number of results | | offset | 0 | Pagination offset | Success Response { "total": 1000, "results": [ { "rank": 1, "username": "top_player", "score": 9850, "avatar": "https://..." }, { "rank": 2, "username": "second_best", "score": 9800, "avatar": "https://..." } ] } Error Code Description 400 Invalid parameters
docs.title: GET /leaderboard

docs.text: User Operations Get User Details GET /users/{id} Retrieve user profile information Path Parameters | Name | Description | |------|--------------| | id | User ID | Success Response { "id": "USER_ID", "username": "example_user", "email": "user@example.com", "joined_at": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z", "stats": { "score": 1500, "rank": 42 } } Error Code Description 401 Unauthorized access 404 User not found
docs.title: User

docs.text: Retrieve user profile information Path Parameters | Name | Description | |------|--------------| | id | User ID | Success Response { "id": "USER_ID", "username": "example_user", "email": "user@example.com", "joined_at": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z", "stats": { "score": 1500, "rank": 42 } } Error Code Description 401 Unauthorized access 404 User not found
docs.title: GET /users/{id}
